lines.text: Maybe instead of ash, it's, like... rock dust?
Like, maybe the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> got frozen over there, and then, like...
When someone tried to move him, he crumbled a little and left dust everywhere?
There's... a lot of reasons that doesn't work.
Too much of the stuff to just crumble off one statue, probably no one to do the movin'...
And there was definitely a fire here, no mistake.
...Yeah, that one was a long shot.
